1�With the current settings, the area reservation will end before the match is over.
1�Do you wish to start the match?Yes.No.
1�Both linkshell leaders have yet to signal their agreement to start the match.
1�Close entries & return to settings?Yes.No.
1�Auto-balance temporary entries?Yes.No.
1�Shuffle temporary entries?Yes.No.
1�LS Liga matches cannot be halted by the MC.

1�Do you wish to halt the match?Yes.No.
1�Halt the match and return to entries?Yes.No.

1�Prepare for the next match?Yes.No.

 gil to enter.

1�The  �[/Wyverns/Griffons] currently outnumber the opposing side. Please wait until the opposing side has more members before submitting an entry application.
1�The maximum number of participants for this match has been reached. Please wait for an entry to be cancelled and try again.
1�Entries are not currently being accepted.Please confirm the match status.
1�You do not have enough gil to submit an entry application.

 ?[set/sets]Match style  [/(fixed)]?F [1 set, 20 min./2 sets, 10 min. each/1 set, 30 min./2 sets, 15 min. each/3 sets, 10 min. each]Other time settings.?@?@?@Item use  [/(fixed)]:  [OK/none]Temporary item settings.?@?@?@Sleep effects removed  [/(fixed)]:  [none/OK]Repair by Petra  [/(fixed)]:  [none/OK]KO penalty   [/(fixed)]:  [Level 1/Level 2]Clear entry data.Reset to default settings.Finish & commence entry period.Quit.
1�Please select the entry type:Return.Information.Auto-balance.Random shuffle.Free.Linkshell (LS Liga).
1�Select settings for team member distribution.
1�Auto-BalanceAfter players have completed a temporary entry for one of the two sides, the players will be redistributed (by main job) evenly among the teams at the beginning of the briefing.
1�Auto-BalanceAfter players have completed a temporary entry for one of the two sides, the MC can choose to redistribute the players (by main job) evenly among the teams.
1�Random ShuffleAfter players have completed a temporary entry for one of the two sides, the MC can choose to randomly shuffle all players between the teams.

1�FreePlayers are allowed to select the team in which they wish to participate. However, if one side grows too large, further applications may be denied until the number of members on the other side has increased.

1�LinkshellThis option can be chosen to conduct LS Liga matches and pits linkshell groups against one another. Once the linkshell leader has submitted an entry application, other linkshell members can then submit their own entries.
1�If both linkshell group leaders do not agree to the rules set by the MC, the match will not begin. Also, leaders must signal their agreement again if any changes are made to the decided settings.
1�Allow re-entry?Return.Information.No.Yes.

1�If re-entry is not allowed, a player will not be able to reapply for match participation in the event he or she requests a discharge before or during a match. Selecting this option may result in unbalanced sides when players cancel their entries.
1�Allow mid-match entry?Return.Information.No.Yes.
1�If mid-match entry is allowed, players may join the team with fewer members while the match is in progress.
1�Allow a margin?Return.Information.Up to 1 member.No.
1�This option selects the size of the allowable margin between team numbers. A margin of zero is suggested in the interests of conducting an equal match.
1�In the case where no margin is allowed, the match will not begin until both sides have an equal number of entries.
1�Allow multiple main jobs?Return.Information.Duplicates OK.No duplicates.

1�This option decides whether or not multiples of the same main job are allowed on a single team. In the case where ??no duplicates?? has been chosen, all members of the same job except for one will have their entries cancelled.
1�Allow support jobs?Return.Information.Yes.No.
1�This option selects whether or not support jobs will be allowed.
1�Please present  $???? or  $???? to be eligible for the entry process.
1�What would you like to do?Nothing.Submit an entry.Cancel an entry.View settings.
1�Please note that if you cancel an entry during an official match, you will be unable to resubmit your entry application.

1�Participants who have completed the entry process can change the match settings by paying a fee of 
� gil.Setting changes are limited to one change per person per match. Settings that have been changed once are fixed for that match.
1�You have already changed the settings for this match.
1�Official match scheduled to end on ?
�.�Area reservation to end on ?
1�Enter the LS Liga match?Enter .Not right now.
1�If all participating linkshell members have concluded entry procedures, please confirm the match settings and signal your agreement to start the match.
1�The match will commence once both linkshell leaders have shown their agreement. Furthermore, any changes made to the settings by the MC will void this agreement.
1�Agree to start the match?Yes.No.
